name: Out of breath (Worstgamecreator)
description:
A game where you volunteer as an astronaut intern but you then get stuck in space due to a space virus    some inconvenient stuff going through, but don't worry! your captain is also infected by the space virus  extremely handsome and can deal with these things! As a space intern, Just please survive, we dont wanna get sued by family members.....

                                                                              ---- Message from the Captain

ps: Made with MZ       pps: Use Winrar to open the folder

22nd April: Demo out, Kinda short, Sprites are MZ chibis, might be shit, Sorry but because I use MZ I don't know how to make the sprites mack, anyone else know?
